channel.title: openssl on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in openssl on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: Python Faq Openssl
item.description: Env os: ubuntu16 出错 /alg -Iscrypt-1.2.1/libcperciva/util -Iscrypt-1.2.1/libcperciva/crypto -I/usr/local/include -I/usr/include -I/usr/include/python2.7 -c scrypt-1.2.1/libcperciva/crypto/crypto_aes.c -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-2.7/scrypt-1.2.1/libcperciva/crypto/crypto_aes.o -O2 scrypt-1.2.1/libcperciva/crypto/crypto_aes.c:6:25: fatal error: openssl/aes.h: No such file or directory compilation terminated. error: command 'x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc' failed with exit status 1 ---------------------------------------- Command "/usr/bin/python -u -c "import setuptools, tokenize;__file__='/tmp/pip-install-qN0XHo/scrypt/setup.py';f=getattr(tokenize, 'open', open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace('\r\n', '\n');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, 'exec'))" install --record /tmp/pip-record-8LxwEK/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --compile" failed with error code 1 in /tmp/pip-install-qN0XHo/scrypt/ root@ip-172-31-23-102:/home/ubuntu/rpc# Step 看错误。这里看的错误，不应该是error: command 'x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc' failed with exit status 1,而应该是fatal error: openssl/aes.
